alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dawson and central Richland Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 415 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Lambert, or 16 miles southwest of Sidney, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lambert and Enid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
